passage_text: Early Life. Duchess of Cornwall, wife of Charles, Prince of Wales and heir to the British throne Camilla Parker Bowles was born Camilla Shand on July 17, 1947, in London, England. She grew up on a large country estate in Plumpton, Sussex, with her parents, Bruce and Rosalind Shand, and her two younger siblings. Synopsis. Camilla Parker Bowles was born on July 17, 1947, in London, England. Her father was Vice Lord Lieutenant of East Sussex and she socialized with Britain’s royalty. She met Prince Charles in 1972. They married other people, but were romantically involved for 25 year

Camilla Parker-Bowles was born on July 17, 1947 in Denmark Hill, London, England as Camilla Rosemary Shand. She has been married to Prince Charles since April 9, 2005. She was previously married to Andrew Parker-Bowles.
